item.description:
Greetings AWers -

At our last meeting, we discussed starting a new cluster group that will meet monthly. The new salon cluster will provide a resource for sharing of creative work, supportive networking and establishing "believing mirror" mentoring, as well as guest lecturers and artists. The salon is designed for those who have read the Artist's Way book and/or others of Julia Cameron's trilogy on the theme of creative reawakening. The salon is not a working group on the book, but rather an extension of the peer networking established after working through a cluster which has focused on the chapters.

The first salon will be on Thursday June 10th at 7pm. I am hoping we can meet at the Gallery (263) as we have done for the past several months. I will be posting the confirmation shortly.

If you are interested in presenting your work and are open to a Q&A with the salon membership, please submit your idea and topic a minimum of two weeks prior to the salon date. (This will allow for a line up of possible presenters and give me an opportunity to pair presentations appropriately.)

All media are welcome -- we are writers, poets, musicians, glass makers, sculptors, photographers, painters, performance artists, chefs (!), book and paper makers, film and videographers -- and all other forms accepted.

Keep the faith, the inspiration, the courage and the discipline --

Best,

Elizabeth
item.how_to_find_us: I will greet you at the door.
item.name: Artist's Way Salon Evenings
